title: The Ultimate Mafioso

fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value:
Can perform an extra kill (besides the faction Mafia kill), from Mafioso.
Can find out a person’s exact role at night, from Consigliere.
Can disguise as someone’s role at night, from Disguiser.
Can see whispers and blackmail someone at night, from Blackmailer.
Can roleblock someone at night, from Consort.
Can frame someone at night, from Framer.
Can forge someone at night, from Forger.
Can clean someone at night, from Janitor.
Can hypnotize someone at night, from Hypnotist. (The message can be from any role in the GIM, probably.)
You can ambush someone, from Ambusher. Those who visit your target will not learn your name.

fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value:
Has basic Defence, from Godfather.
However, you can only use one ability per night, and each ability only has 1 use.

desc:
Post 116
As The Ultimate Mafioso, you’re great at all things Mafia related.
